tool_description: Groups review texts into thematic clusters based on content similarity, using machine learning clustering algorithms to identify common themes and topics in customer feedback.

texts.description: Array of review texts to cluster into themes

keywords.description: Array of extracted keywords to enhance clustering

num_clusters.description: Number of theme clusters to generate (2-20)

clustering_method.description: Clustering algorithm: kmeans, hierarchical, or dbscan

min_cluster_size.description: Minimum number of reviews per cluster

error_messages: Insufficient data: Provide at least 10 texts for meaningful clustering.
Invalid cluster count: num_clusters must be between 2 and 20.
Unsupported method: Use kmeans, hierarchical, or dbscan for clustering_method.
Invalid parameters: min_cluster_size must be >= 1, similarity_threshold must be between 0.1 and 0.9.
Clustering failed: Unable to generate meaningful clusters with current parameters.
Convergence error: Clustering algorithm failed to converge with given settings.
usage: Provide review texts and optionally keywords to enhance clustering. Configure the number of clusters and algorithm parameters for optimal theme identification.

cluster_labels.description: Array of cluster assignments for each input text

cluster_themes.description: Array of descriptive theme names for each cluster

cluster_sizes.description: Array of review counts for each cluster

theme_keywords.description: Array of top keywords for each theme cluster

clustering_summary.description: Summary of clustering results and theme distribution
